FuncDef:
The display rip interface command displays information about a RIP-capable interface.
The display ripng interface command displays information about RIPng interfaces. The display rip interface command displays information about a RIP-capable interface. The display ripng interface command displays information about RIPng interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

Displays detailed information about a RIPng interface.
-
